column1: Uchi////I don't write reviews often but I'm prompted to do so because of some of the negative comments posted. Some of these cheap
column2: bitter women complaining about first dates and proper service have nothing to do with this great establishment. Each dish complex
column3: really quality fish from great purveyors. Those listen to the negative reviews should hit a strip mall sushi joint to get their pleasures. This place is the real deal.
